div.h2: Brand-Generic Code Reported by Submitting Plan

div.p: Plan reported value indicating whether the plan adjudicated the claim as a brand or generic drug. Applies to covered drugs only. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/brndgnrccd
This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-brnd-gnrc-cd defines the following codes:

name.value: Brand-Generic Code Reported by Submitting Plan

title.value: Brand-Generic Code Reported by Submitting Plan

description.value: Plan reported value indicating whether the plan adjudicated the claim as a brand or generic drug. Applies to covered drugs only. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/brnd_gnrc_cd
